definition[0]: able to continue without causing damage to the environment
example[0]: The government should do more to promote sustainable agriculture.
example[1]: the sustainable use of rainforest resources
example[2]: Cycling is a totally sustainable form of transport.
definition[1]: able to continue for a long time
example[4]: The party is promising low inflation and sustainable economic growth.
definition[2]: strong enough to continue existing or happening for a long time
example[5]: The market wants to see more evidence that price stability is sustainable.
